title: xMatix Payroll
subtitle: Execute payroll with accuracy and confidence

hero.title: xMatix Payroll
hero.description1: Pay on time. Comply always. Resolve exceptions early.
hero.description2: xMatix Payroll helps organizations execute payroll operations with governed workflows, real time validations, and full audit readiness across the payroll lifecycle.

cardsData.title: The problem
cardsData.content: Payroll errors often arise from fragmented data, late inputs, manual corrections, and limited visibility into execution before payouts.
list: Attendance and incentive data arrives late
Errors are detected too close to payout

cardsData.title: The xMatix Approach
cardsData.content: xMatix Payroll standardizes how payroll is prepared, validated, approved, and executed so every payroll cycle follows a consistent and governed process.

keyCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
keyCapabilities.description2: xMatix Payroll modernizes payroll execution without replacing existing payroll or ERP systems while improving accuracy, compliance, and control.

cardsData.title: Payroll Cycle Execution
cardsData.description: Orchestrate payroll workflows from data collection to final payout approval.

cardsData.title: Policy and Compliance Enforcement
cardsData.description: Apply statutory rules, tax policies, and company controls automatically during execution.

cardsData.title: Exception Detection and Resolution
cardsData.description: Identify discrepancies, anomalies, and missing inputs early and resolve them within governed workflows.

cardsData.title: Integration with Time and Incentives
cardsData.description: Align payroll execution with attendance, incentives, and approved adjustments.

cardsData.title: Audit Ready Payroll Records
cardsData.description: Maintain complete payroll history, approvals, and compliance documentation.

requestADemo.heading: See xMatix Payroll in Action
requestADemo.description: Reduce payroll errors, improve compliance, and gain confidence in every payout without disrupting existing systems.
